room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: There are only positive things that can be said about this place! The clues were challenging but not overwhelming to the point where we wanted to give up. The staff are excited about each room and how they get to contribute to the overall experience of our group. The owner was very friendly and answered all of our questions. This is a great place for a team building exercise or even as a date night. Fantastic experience overall!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: This was amazing! Loved Escape the Hydeout. The setting is just awesome - a perfect blend of eerie and historical. The puzzles here were unique and hard but not impossible. It was so much fun and we are ready for whatever they do next!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: Absolutely awesome! Creepy setting but not scary, great period environment, and incredibly complex but fun puzzles. So excited to have this site in our area!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: This place is fantastic! Our game host was so helpful and just as excited for us as we were to play the game! The room is challenging but has a ton of exciting features. It's a must if you are in the area!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Hartford
review: Escape the Hideout was a great game! We loved Escape the Nemesis at their NYC location and were so excited to try this one. Worth it! Can't wait for their next rooms!
